name: Benchmark
long_description: Benchmark is the fastest way to screen deals & analyze investment data. Benchmark efficiently extracts, organizes, and summarizes key information from any data source in seconds, while automatically building a proprietary comp database. With Benchmark, decision makers can capitalize on opportunities with unmatched speed and precision. Visit https://withbenchmark.com to accelerate your investment process today.
one_liner: The fastest way to screen deals & aggregate investment data.
